trc.option.inventory.auto_restock.descri: Automatically restocks blocks in your hotbar when you place the last one of a stack.
trc.option.inventory.auto_restock.title: Auto restock
Items are moved instantly when using shift + hover over an item in inventories.
trc.option.inventory.title: Inventory
trc.option.visuals.show_armor_hud.descri: Toggles the display of the armor items on the screen.
trc.option.visuals.show_armor_hud.title: Show Armor HUD
trc.option.visuals.show_arrow_hud.descri: Toggles the display of the number of arrows in your inventory on the screen.
